text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: upaviSTaM tataH skandaM hiraNyakavacasrajam
text.ur: upaviṣṭaṁ tataḥ skandaṁ hiraṇyakavacasrajam

text.ascii: hiraNyacUDamukuTaM hiraNyAkSaM mahAprabham
text.ur: hiraṇyacūḍamukuṭaṁ hiraṇyākṣaṁ mahāprabham

text.ascii: lohitAmbarasaMvItaM tIkSNadaMSTraM manoramam
text.ur: lohitāmbarasaṁvītaṁ tīkṣṇadaṁṣṭraṁ manoramam

text.ascii: sarvalakSaNasaMpannaM trailokyasyApi supriyam
text.ur: sarvalakṣaṇasaṁpannaṁ trailokyasyāpi supriyam

text.ascii: tatas taM varadaM zUraM yuvAnaM mRSTakuNDalam
text.ur: tatas taṁ varadaṁ śūraṁ yuvānaṁ mr̥ṣṭakuṇḍalam

text.ascii: abhajat padmarUpA zrIH svayam eva zarIriNI
text.ur: abhajat padmarūpā śrīḥ svayam eva śarīriṇī

text.ascii: zriyA juSTaH pRthuyazAH sa kumAravaras tadA
text.ur: śriyā juṣṭaḥ pr̥thuyaśāḥ sa kumāravaras tadā

text.ascii: niSaNNo dRzyate bhUtaiH paurNamAsyAM yathA zazI
text.ud: निषण्णो दृश्यते भूतैः पौर्णमास्यां यथा शशी
text.ur: niṣaṇṇo dr̥śyate bhūtaiḥ paurṇamāsyāṁ yathā śaśī

text.ascii: apUjayan mahAtmAno brAhmaNAs taM mahAbalam
text.ur: apūjayan mahātmāno brāhmaṇās taṁ mahābalam

text.ascii: idam Ahus tadA caiva skandaM tatra maharSayaH
text.ur: idam āhus tadā caiva skandaṁ tatra maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: hiraNyavarNa bhadraM te lokAnAM zaMkaro bhava
text.ud: हिरण्यवर्ण भद्रं ते लोकानां शंकरो भव
text.ur: hiraṇyavarṇa bhadraṁ te lokānāṁ śaṁkaro bhava

text.ascii: tvayA SaDrAtrajAtena sarve lokA vazIkRtAH
text.ur: tvayā ṣaḍrātrajātena sarve lokā vaśīkr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: abhayaM ca punar dattaM tvayaivaiSAM surottama
text.ur: abhayaṁ ca punar dattaṁ tvayaivaiṣāṁ surottama

text.ascii: tasmAd indro bhavAn astu trailokyasyAbhayaMkaraH
text.ur: tasmād indro bhavān astu trailokyasyābhayaṁkaraḥ

text.ascii: skanda uvAca
text.ur: skanda uvāca

text.ascii: kim indraH sarvalokAnAM karotIha tapodhanAH
text.ur: kim indraḥ sarvalokānāṁ karotīha tapodhanāḥ

text.ascii: kathaM devagaNAMz caiva pAti nityaM surezvaraH
text.ur: kathaṁ devagaṇāṁś caiva pāti nityaṁ sureśvaraḥ

text.ascii: RSaya UcuH
text.ur: r̥ṣaya ūcuḥ

text.ascii: indro dizati bhUtAnAM balaM tejaH prajAH sukham
text.ud: इन्द्रो दिशति भूतानां बलं तेजः प्रजाः सुखम्
text.ur: indro diśati bhūtānāṁ balaṁ tejaḥ prajāḥ sukham

text.ascii: tuSTaH prayacchati tathA sarvAn dAyAn surezvaraH
text.ur: tuṣṭaḥ prayacchati tathā sarvān dāyān sureśvaraḥ

text.ascii: durvRttAnAM saMharati vRttasthAnAM prayacchati
text.ur: durvr̥ttānāṁ saṁharati vr̥ttasthānāṁ prayacchati

text.ascii: anuzAsti ca bhUtAni kAryeSu balasUdanaH
text.ur: anuśāsti ca bhūtāni kāryeṣu balasūdanaḥ

text.ascii: asUrye ca bhavet sUryas tathAcandre ca candramAH
text.ur: asūrye ca bhavet sūryas tathācandre ca candramāḥ

text.ascii: bhavaty agniz ca vAyuz ca pRthivy Apaz ca kAraNaiH
text.ur: bhavaty agniś ca vāyuś ca pr̥thivy āpaś ca kāraṇaiḥ

text.ascii: etad indreNa kartavyam indre hi vipulaM balam
text.ur: etad indreṇa kartavyam indre hi vipulaṁ balam

text.ascii: tvaM ca vIra balazreSThas tasmAd indro bhavasva naH
text.ud: त्वं च वीर बलश्रेष्ठस्तस्मादिन्द्रो भवस्व नः
text.ur: tvaṁ ca vīra balaśreṣṭhas tasmād indro bhavasva naḥ

text.ascii: zakra uvAca
text.ur: śakra uvāca

text.ascii: bhavasvendro mahAbAho sarveSAM naH sukhAvahaH
text.ur: bhavasvendro mahābāho sarveṣāṁ naḥ sukhāvahaḥ

text.ascii: abhiSicyasva caivAdya prAptarUpo 'si sattama
text.ur: abhiṣicyasva caivādya prāptarūpo ’si sattama

text.ascii: skanda uvAca
text.ur: skanda uvāca

text.ascii: zAdhi tvam eva trailokyam avyagro vijaye rataH
text.ur: śādhi tvam eva trailokyam avyagro vijaye rataḥ

text.ascii: ahaM te kiMkaraH zakra na mamendratvam Ipsitam
text.ud: अहं ते किंकरः शक्र न ममेन्द्रत्वमीप्सितम्
text.ur: ahaṁ te kiṁkaraḥ śakra na mamendratvam īpsitam

text.ascii: zakra uvAca
text.ur: śakra uvāca

text.ascii: balaM tavAdbhutaM vIra tvaM devAnAm arIJ jahi
text.ur: balaṁ tavādbhutaṁ vīra tvaṁ devānām arīñ jahi

text.ascii: avajJAsyanti mAM lokA vIryeNa tava vismitAH
text.ud: अवज्ञास्यन्ति मां लोका वीर्येण तव विस्मिताः
text.ur: avajñāsyanti māṁ lokā vīryeṇa tava vismitāḥ

text.ascii: indratve 'pi sthitaM vIra balahInaM parAjitam
text.ur: indratve ’pi sthitaṁ vīra balahīnaṁ parājitam

text.ascii: Avayoz ca mitho bhede prayatiSyanty atandritAH
text.ur: āvayoś ca mitho bhede prayatiṣyanty atandritāḥ

text.ascii: bhedite ca tvayi vibho loko dvaidham upeSyati
text.ud: भेदिते च त्वयि विभो लोको द्वैधमुपेष्यति
text.ur: bhedite ca tvayi vibho loko dvaidham upeṣyati

text.ascii: dvidhAbhUteSu lokeSu nizciteSv Avayos tathA
text.ur: dvidhābhūteṣu lokeṣu niściteṣv āvayos tathā

text.ascii: vigrahaH saMpravarteta bhUtabhedAn mahAbala
text.ur: vigrahaḥ saṁpravarteta bhūtabhedān mahābala

text.ascii: tatra tvaM mAM raNe tAta yathAzraddhaM vijeSyasi
text.ud: तत्र त्वं मां रणे तात यथाश्रद्धं विजेष्यसि
text.ur: tatra tvaṁ māṁ raṇe tāta yathāśraddhaṁ vijeṣyasi

text.ascii: tasmAd indro bhavAn adya bhavitA mA vicAraya
text.ur: tasmād indro bhavān adya bhavitā mā vicāraya

text.ascii: skanda uvAca
text.ur: skanda uvāca

text.ascii: tvam eva rAjA bhadraM te trailokyasya mamaiva ca
text.ud: त्वमेव राजा भद्रं ते त्रैलोक्यस्य ममैव च
text.ur: tvam eva rājā bhadraṁ te trailokyasya mamaiva ca

text.ascii: karomi kiM ca te zakra zAsanaM tad bravIhi me
text.ud: करोमि किं च ते शक्र शासनं तद्ब्रवीहि मे
text.ur: karomi kiṁ ca te śakra śāsanaṁ tad bravīhi me

text.ascii: zakra uvAca
text.ur: śakra uvāca

text.ascii: yadi satyam idaM vAkyaM nizcayAd bhASitaM tvayA
text.ur: yadi satyam idaṁ vākyaṁ niścayād bhāṣitaṁ tvayā

text.ascii: yadi vA zAsanaM skanda kartum icchasi me zRNu
text.ud: यदि वा शासनं स्कन्द कर्तुमिच्छसि मे शृणु
text.ur: yadi vā śāsanaṁ skanda kartum icchasi me śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: abhiSicyasva devAnAM senApatye mahAbala
text.ur: abhiṣicyasva devānāṁ senāpatye mahābala

text.ascii: aham indro bhaviSyAmi tava vAkyAn mahAbala
text.ur: aham indro bhaviṣyāmi tava vākyān mahābala

text.ascii: skanda uvAca
text.ur: skanda uvāca

text.ascii: dAnavAnAM vinAzAya devAnAm arthasiddhaye
text.ur: dānavānāṁ vināśāya devānām arthasiddhaye

text.ascii: gobrAhmaNasya trANArthaM senApatye 'bhiSiJca mAm
text.ur: gobrāhmaṇasya trāṇārthaṁ senāpatye ’bhiṣiñca mām

text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: so 'bhiSikto maghavatA sarvair devagaNaiH saha
text.ur: so ’bhiṣikto maghavatā sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha

text.ascii: atIva zuzubhe tatra pUjyamAno maharSibhiH
text.ur: atīva śuśubhe tatra pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ

text.ascii: tasya tat kAJcanaM chatraM dhriyamANaM vyarocata
text.ur: tasya tat kāñcanaṁ chatraṁ dhriyamāṇaṁ vyarocata

text.ascii: yathaiva susamiddhasya pAvakasyAtmamaNDalam
text.ur: yathaiva susamiddhasya pāvakasyātmamaṇḍalam

text.ascii: vizvakarmakRtA cAsya divyA mAlA hiraNmayI
text.ur: viśvakarmakr̥tā cāsya divyā mālā hiraṇmayī

text.ascii: AbaddhA tripuraghnena svayam eva yazasvinA
text.ur: ābaddhā tripuraghnena svayam eva yaśasvinā

text.ascii: Agamya manujavyAghra saha devyA paraMtapa
text.ur: āgamya manujavyāghra saha devyā paraṁtapa

text.ascii: arcayAm Asa suprIto bhagavAn govRSadhvajaH
text.ur: arcayām āsa suprīto bhagavān govr̥ṣadhvajaḥ

text.ascii: rudram agniM dvijAH prAhU rudrasUnus tatas tu saH
text.ur: rudram agniṁ dvijāḥ prāhū rudrasūnus tatas tu saḥ

text.ascii: rudreNa zukram utsRSTaM tac chvetaH parvato 'bhavat
text.ur: rudreṇa śukram utsr̥ṣṭaṁ tac chvetaḥ parvato ’bhavat

text.ascii: pAvakasyendriyaM zvete kRttikAbhiH kRtaM nage
text.ur: pāvakasyendriyaṁ śvete kr̥ttikābhiḥ kr̥taṁ nage

text.ascii: pUjyamAnaM tu rudreNa dRSTvA sarve divaukasaH
text.ud: पूज्यमानं तु रुद्रेण दृष्ट्वा सर्वे दिवौकसः
text.ur: pūjyamānaṁ tu rudreṇa dr̥ṣṭvā sarve divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: rudrasUnuM tataH prAhur guhaM guNavatAM varam
text.ur: rudrasūnuṁ tataḥ prāhur guhaṁ guṇavatāṁ varam

text.ascii: anupravizya rudreNa vahniM jAto hy ayaM zizuH
text.ud: अनुप्रविश्य रुद्रेण वह्निं जातो ह्ययं शिशुः
text.ur: anupraviśya rudreṇa vahniṁ jāto hy ayaṁ śiśuḥ

text.ascii: tatra jAtas tataH skando rudrasUnus tato 'bhavat
text.ur: tatra jātas tataḥ skando rudrasūnus tato ’bhavat

text.ascii: rudrasya vahneH svAhAyAH SaNNAM strINAM ca tejasA
text.ud: रुद्रस्य वह्नेः स्वाहायाः षण्णां स्त्रीणां च तेजसा
text.ur: rudrasya vahneḥ svāhāyāḥ ṣaṇṇāṁ strīṇāṁ ca tejasā

text.ascii: jAtaH skandaH surazreSTho rudrasUnus tato 'bhavat
text.ur: jātaḥ skandaḥ suraśreṣṭho rudrasūnus tato ’bhavat

text.ascii: araje vAsasI rakte vasAnaH pAvakAtmajaH
text.ur: araje vāsasī rakte vasānaḥ pāvakātmajaḥ

text.ascii: bhAti dIptavapuH zrImAn raktAbhrAbhyAm ivAMzumAn
text.ur: bhāti dīptavapuḥ śrīmān raktābhrābhyām ivāṁśumān

text.ascii: kukkuTaz cAgninA dattas tasya ketur alaMkRtaH
text.ur: kukkuṭaś cāgninā dattas tasya ketur alaṁkr̥taḥ

text.ascii: rathe samucchrito bhAti kAlAgnir iva lohitaH
text.ur: rathe samucchrito bhāti kālāgnir iva lohitaḥ

text.ascii: viveza kavacaM cAsya zarIraM sahajaM tataH
text.ud: विवेश कवचं चास्य शरीरं सहजं ततः
text.ur: viveśa kavacaṁ cāsya śarīraṁ sahajaṁ tataḥ

text.ascii: yudhyamAnasya devasya prAdurbhavati tat sadA
text.ur: yudhyamānasya devasya prādurbhavati tat sadā

text.ascii: zaktir varma balaM tejaH kAntatvaM satyam akSatiH
text.ur: śaktir varma balaṁ tejaḥ kāntatvaṁ satyam akṣatiḥ

text.ascii: brahmaNyatvam asaMmoho bhaktAnAM parirakSaNam
text.ur: brahmaṇyatvam asaṁmoho bhaktānāṁ parirakṣaṇam

text.ascii: nikRntanaM ca zatrUNAM lokAnAM cAbhirakSaNam
text.ur: nikr̥ntanaṁ ca śatrūṇāṁ lokānāṁ cābhirakṣaṇam

text.ascii: skandena saha jAtAni sarvANy eva janAdhipa
text.ur: skandena saha jātāni sarvāṇy eva janādhipa

text.ascii: evaM devagaNaiH sarvaiH so 'bhiSiktaH svalaMkRtaH
text.ur: evaṁ devagaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ so ’bhiṣiktaḥ svalaṁkr̥taḥ

text.ascii: babhau pratItaH sumanAH paripUrNendudarzanaH
text.ur: babhau pratītaḥ sumanāḥ paripūrṇendudarśanaḥ

text.ascii: iSTaiH svAdhyAyaghoSaiz ca devatUryaravair api
text.ur: iṣṭaiḥ svādhyāyaghoṣaiś ca devatūryaravair api

text.ascii: devagandharvagItaiz ca sarvair apsarasAM gaNaiH
text.ur: devagandharvagītaiś ca sarvair apsarasāṁ gaṇaiḥ

text.ascii: etaiz cAnyaiz ca vividhair hRSTatuSTair alaMkRtaiH
text.ur: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair hr̥ṣṭatuṣṭair alaṁkr̥taiḥ

text.ascii: krIDann iva tadA devair abhiSiktaH sa pAvakiH
text.ur: krīḍann iva tadā devair abhiṣiktaḥ sa pāvakiḥ

text.ascii: abhiSiktaM mahAsenam apazyanta divaukasaH
text.ur: abhiṣiktaṁ mahāsenam apaśyanta divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: vinihatya tamaH sUryaM yathehAbhyuditaM tathA
text.ur: vinihatya tamaḥ sūryaṁ yathehābhyuditaṁ tathā

text.ascii: athainam abhyayuH sarvA devasenAH sahasrazaH
text.ur: athainam abhyayuḥ sarvā devasenāḥ sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: asmAkaM tvaM patir iti bruvANAH sarvatodizam
text.ur: asmākaṁ tvaṁ patir iti bruvāṇāḥ sarvatodiśam

text.ascii: tAH samAsAdya bhagavAn sarvabhUtagaNair vRtaH
text.ur: tāḥ samāsādya bhagavān sarvabhūtagaṇair vr̥taḥ

text.ascii: arcitaz ca stutaz caiva sAntvayAm Asa tA api
text.ur: arcitaś ca stutaś caiva sāntvayām āsa tā api

text.ascii: zatakratuz cAbhiSicya skandaM senApatiM tadA
text.ur: śatakratuś cābhiṣicya skandaṁ senāpatiṁ tadā

text.ascii: sasmAra tAM devasenAM yA sA tena vimokSitA
text.ud: सस्मार तां देवसेनां या सा तेन विमोक्षिता
text.ur: sasmāra tāṁ devasenāṁ yā sā tena vimokṣitā

text.ascii: ayaM tasyAH patir nUnaM vihito brahmaNA svayam
text.ud: अयं तस्याः पतिर्नूनं विहितो ब्रह्मणा स्वयम्
text.ur: ayaṁ tasyāḥ patir nūnaṁ vihito brahmaṇā svayam

text.ascii: iti cintyAnayAm Asa devasenAM svalaMkRtAm
text.ur: iti cintyānayām āsa devasenāṁ svalaṁkr̥tām

text.ascii: skandaM covAca balabhid iyaM kanyA surottama
text.ur: skandaṁ covāca balabhid iyaṁ kanyā surottama

text.ascii: ajAte tvayi nirdiSTA tava patnI svayaMbhuvA
text.ud: अजाते त्वयि निर्दिष्टा तव पत्नी स्वयंभुवा
text.ur: ajāte tvayi nirdiṣṭā tava patnī svayaṁbhuvā

text.ascii: tasmAt tvam asyA vidhivat pANiM mantrapuraskRtam
text.ur: tasmāt tvam asyā vidhivat pāṇiṁ mantrapuraskr̥tam

text.ascii: gRhANa dakSiNaM devyAH pANinA padmavarcasam
text.ur: gr̥hāṇa dakṣiṇaṁ devyāḥ pāṇinā padmavarcasam

text.ascii: evam uktaH sa jagrAha tasyAH pANiM yathAvidhi
text.ud: एवमुक्तः स जग्राह तस्याः पाणिं यथाविधि
text.ur: evam uktaḥ sa jagrāha tasyāḥ pāṇiṁ yathāvidhi

text.ascii: bRhaspatir mantravidhiM jajApa ca juhAva ca
text.ur: br̥haspatir mantravidhiṁ jajāpa ca juhāva ca

text.ascii: evaM skandasya mahiSIM devasenAM vidur budhAH
text.ur: evaṁ skandasya mahiṣīṁ devasenāṁ vidur budhāḥ

text.ascii: SaSThIM yAM brAhmaNAH prAhur lakSmIm AzAM sukhapradAm
text.ur: ṣaṣṭhīṁ yāṁ brāhmaṇāḥ prāhur lakṣmīm āśāṁ sukhapradām

text.ascii: sinIvAlIM kuhUM caiva sadvRttim aparAjitAm
text.ur: sinīvālīṁ kuhūṁ caiva sadvr̥ttim aparājitām

text.ascii: yadA skandaH patir labdhaH zAzvato devasenayA
text.ur: yadā skandaḥ patir labdhaḥ śāśvato devasenayā

text.ascii: tadA tam Azrayal lakSmIH svayaM devI zarIriNI
text.ur: tadā tam āśrayal lakṣmīḥ svayaṁ devī śarīriṇī

text.ascii: zrIjuSTaH paJcamIM skandas tasmAc chrIpaJcamI smRtA
text.ur: śrījuṣṭaḥ pañcamīṁ skandas tasmāc chrīpañcamī smr̥tā

text.ascii: SaSThyAM kRtArtho 'bhUd yasmAt tasmAt SaSThI mahAtithiH
text.ur: ṣaṣṭhyāṁ kr̥tārtho ’bhūd yasmāt tasmāt ṣaṣṭhī mahātithiḥ
